item.description:
This is Boston Ballet's annual performance of The Nutcracker. Tickets are $40 each--full price is normally $78. Prices go up as the performance nears and tickets are sold, so you won't be able to beat this special rate.

The performance begins at 7:30 and lasts for two hours with one intermission.

We have 20 seats reserved in a group on the Mezzanine level: six each in rows G, H, and I (seats 2-12) and two seats in row J (seats 2 and 4). You can find a seating chart here: http://www.bostonball...

PAYMENTS:
1. Go to www.beerbrew.com. We have a secure site for web commerce.
2. Click the "Home Goods" link on the left of the page (in the Online Store box).
3. Click "Other Home Goods" on the next page
4. Click "Boston Ballet Nutcracker Tickets",
5. Select the number of tickets you want, click the "Checkout" button, and
6. Fill out the information as needed: for "Shipping Method" use "Store Pickup" and select West Boylston.

You can e-mail me if you don't want to use the online store, but it will be first-come, first served, and the online store's quicker.

GETTING THERE:
I can rent a van (I'll drive) if enough people want to go together. Please let me know if you want to use this option and I'll contact you regarding the cost.

If you'd rather car pool, let me know and I'll get the car poolers in contact with each other.

Reviews are excellent for this annual treat.

Reviews from 2009:
Boston Ballet’s Nutcracker Sparkles
http://tech.mit.edu/V...

Boston Ballet ‘The Nutcracker’
http://www.ballet.co....

Four member reviews (all 5 stars)
http://www.artsboston...
item.name: Boston Ballet Nutcracker - Half Price
